documents.document: @NZNationalParty @pmbillenglish not a Nat voter but now I will be shouting even louder against you due to your shaming silence on Trump.
@metlinkwgtn Thanks, DM on its way.
@metlinkwgtn FYI 3 days in a row the 7.45 number 23 from Houghton Bay has not turned up. I've been late for work all this week as a result.
@SDoughtyMP @hopenothate @andyburnhammp Please sign this on behalf of your Leigh constituents who despise @POTUS brand of bigotry.
@pmbillenglish "To sin by silence when we should protest makes cowards out of men". Choose to be on the right side of history.
@pmbillenglish Glad you were able to have a good time while so many people are suffering due to the #muslimban and inadequate refugee quotas
@pmbillenglish Are you prepared to condemn the US #MuslimBan on behalf of the NZ people?
@metlinkwgtn real time is showing 23 from Houghton Bay as running but nothing has turned up, do you have any more info?
@GeorgeMichael you will forever be my first love. Your music played a huge part in my life. Utterly bereft. RIP beautiful man & thankyou xxx
The 2 things that made my 2 yr old roar with laughter today: the wind and the bucket fountain. He's SUCH a Wellingtonian. #wgtn #Wellington
@jonesthewelsh @BBC_Travel I am saying a big NO to the human soup rollercoaster.
Got a delicious strawberry sundae served by @justin_lester which was very exciting! Hope you raise loads of money fâ€¦ https://t.co/KHGlO7lKtl
@jonesthewelsh I'm going to put them on speed dial. You may have to explain to me how to do that ;-)
@wearejames I've waited a long time for last night but you were amazing. A blaze of light in a bleak week. Love from a Manc expat in NZ xxx
@HillaryClinton Haven't been a little girl for a long time but this 40 year old woman needed to be reminded of that too. Thank you Hillary.
What to Say to the Women in Your Life Today https://t.co/sLsFzaQmFW via @Esquire
@stephanie07 institutionalised and internalised misogyny in action.
@incurablehippie @S_K_Mouse just when I dared to hope we were making some progress, along come the sad white men to put us back in our place
The thought that so many people can vote for a racist, sexist, bigoted liar breaks my heart.
@WhiteStuffUK have sent DM with details of situation. Thanks very much in advance.
@WhiteStuffUK my husband bought pair of your trousers in UK, now back in NZ but security tag still on, what's best solution please?
Roald Dahl was my first true author love. How grateful I am to have read the wonderful imaginings of such a genius #RoaldDahlDay #dahl100
@WgtnVenues can you explain the rationale behind booking both @wearejames and @OfficialTLC on the same night? Many people would go to both.
@johnkeypm @Hurricanesrugby not bad for a dying city eh John?
If I hear one more bride on #sayyestothedress say "it's a very classy wedding" then pick a see through dress... #stripperfairyisnotclassy
House 5 surely? Not that much of a surprise, it's been there all along #TheBlockNZ
The judges have said 'nice' about 5000 times in Nikki & Tiff's house. Talk about damning with faint praise. #TheBlockNZ
Trying to convince @jonesthewelsh that we should invite the Obamas round for a dinner party where we have too much red wine & dance around.
There are good people around. A man just paid a stranger's bus fare, she's with her young son and didn't have money on her snapper. #wgtn
I think my toddler has greater emotional intelligence and throws fewer tantrums than Dyls/z #TheBlockNZ
I think I'm even more gutted for Wales than I was when England were knocked out. Dream big.
@NigelBushty As is Courtney #theblocknz
@andyburnhammp will you support @paulasherriff suggestion of an all-party commission to consider post-referendum race hate crime?
I've been to a demo with Ray from @MiramarTheRoxy and it was incredible. Such a talented bloke. #theblocknz
@lyallbaynz @suzienewshoes @Houghton_Bay @WgtnCC Green would make more sense! like the blue/white dress all over again. Will run out soon.
@WgtnCC Do you know when the blue recycling bags will be delivered to Houghton Bay? I thought it was by the end of May.
@andyburnhammp Manchester's gain will be Leigh's loss. Your work for our town has been incredible and relentless #ThankYourMP
England, you give with one (rugby) hand, you take away with the (football) other. The ultimate mixed emotions.
@S_K_Mouse oh so gorgeous! I reckon their support was the crucial factor in the result! Hope they enjoyed the game x
Well this seems... entirely appropriate for a child's quilt. https://t.co/e2ypJj3cNs
Big pod of dolphins near Moa Point @lyallbaynz #lyallbay #Wellington #dolphins
Love this from @goodmag - time to follow the dream https://t.co/4Tj6BkrrTa
@lyallbaynz too far away to get decent photos (I'm on the hill) but looks like there's a paddle boarder there so maybe they will.
Big pod of dolphins in Lyall Bay right now @lyallbaynz #dolphins #wellington #lyallbay
@chbutchery picked up one of your hams for Christmas, can't wait to try it - do you have a recommended glaze?
@metlinkwgtn it was 20 mins late by the time we gave up and got in the car. Sort of defeats the object of a public transport system.
@metlinkwgtn is the 10.20 number 23 from Houghton Bay just not bothering to turn up then? Waiting in the cold with a baby.
@MasterChefNZ what happened after filming to all the cut pumpkin in the background? Say it wasn't wasted! #lovefoodhatewaste @Kaibosh_NZ
@johnkeypm Once more with feeling, John.
@DomPost 8 month old Eli is supporting the Hurricanes http://t.co/xjzAHh4KlI
@Hurricanesrugby 8 month old Eli says Go The Mighty Canes! #Hurricanes #HURvHIG #wellington #SuperRugbyFinal http://t.co/opqZmpkUN5
At least two large fins in Lyall Bay this morning - too big for dolphins, not sure what they are but worth a look #wellington @lyallbaynz
Did my reading of Do Not Go Gentle... at @WelshDragonBar for #DylanDay. Any other Wgtn Dylan Thomas fans should head down there tonight.
@KiwibankNZ treated my husband to a surprise holiday in the Cook Islands for his 30th, worth every cent I'd saved to see him so happy.
@jonesthewelsh @gelissimo @WhyWellington @HarboursideMrkt yep, this was mine this morning. Such lovely people, too. http://t.co/vec6baPgRX
"@jonesthewelsh: just how many self-esteem issues does the designer of this babygro have? RT http://t.co/VtSeBlKIx3" @suzienewshoes"
@S_K_Mouse @bbcstrictly I know, right? I'd placed a social media embargo on myself too. Hope you enjoyed the final? They were all so good!
@bbcstrictly How kind of the BBC to put winner of strictly on the front page of their website, saving me the trouble of watching on catchup.
@Everton Eli aged 7 weeks is dreaming of his first blue Christmas #efc #efcbaby #coyb #bluechristmas http://t.co/9einjdzfnT
Lying in bed listening to @jonesthewelsh singing @thebeatles songs to baby Eli during a night feed #heartmelt
@gregkallinson hi Greg. Any recommendations for a good 2014 wine to lay down for our baby boy who was born in October? @jonesthewelsh
@NekoCase We brought our brand new baby boy, Eli, home from hospital. Best day ever.
@jonesthewelsh @Panderys83 absolutely, sounds right up my street. DO YOU WANT ME TO CRY REAL TEARS? IS THAT WHAT YOU WANT?
@jonesthewelsh @theJeremyVine Well that's the Welsh for you. Racist.
@jonesthewelsh @theJeremyVine Bolton people are NOT my people #leyther
After years of selfless dedication, duke carvells double down is by a million miles the best #burgerwellington I've tried in #woap
@jonesthewelsh @Panderys83 @GaryLineker How annoying.
And now good luck to @weRengland in relay triathlon. Gutted it's bedtime for this expat and I'll miss it.
Can't believe i've just texted my husband @jonesthewelsh to tell him the results of gymnastics but @Jonsey90 was so fab. Congratulations!
@S_K_Mouse how brilliant! And did your Mog Edwards look anything like @ioangruffudd ?
Late to the party but last night watched @bbcwales Under Milk Wood. Absolutely stunning, the poetry of #dylanthomas celebrated beautifully.
@Panderys83 @zzzTalker I will try poking the bear. So to speak.
@Panderys83 @zzzTalker He's been disappointingly quiet recently.
@Panderys83 Costa Rica for me because I love an underdog. My heart is genuinely racing though! That crossbar has had a pounding tonight.
For a 0-0 game this has been pretty nailbiting. Don't think I can stand the trauma of penalties and I'm a neutral #WorldCup
@nextofficial No thanks, just a public response please. It happens often to my aunt to so it's clearly a marketing strategy.
@nextofficial Can you explain the ethical reasoning for charging my pensioner mother for a directory that she neither requested nor wanted?
@NextHelp sure, on its way.
@NextHelp Sent an urgent email but no response, was sent the wrong size swimming costume, in NZ, going on hols in 11 days, help please?
@gr8dairynobull Ah what a shame but forewarned is forearmed so I will keep my stocks high! It's absolutely delicious, well done guys.
@gr8dairynobull hi lovely people, are you absolutely, definitely sure that Raspberry & Amaretto yoghurt will be limited edition? #addiction
Whoooot whoot! Love it when just sometimes it becomes about more than just the power ballad, the frock and the facial hair.
True story, Eurovision voting is why I took French as an option at school.
Come on, no mucking about. L'Autriche douze points all the way, everyone.
@Chantal_Patton she is an actual feeder.
@S_K_Mouse oh I hear you. Even at 7am I was fancying a cheeky tipple, which hints at all kinds of problems.
Can someone in the UK chuck in a vote for Conchita for me? There's a love.
@S_K_Mouse I love it! Mine is all in my head, low tech style. Watching it sober for the first time in my life is helping.
@PaulSando She was in another league.
@S_K_Mouse ooh me too, good taste, although that is relative considering it's Eurovision.
@S_K_Mouse who you voting for? Austria douze points in this house (ie just me)
I have only knowingly danced in the rain once, and much beer played a significant part in the decision to do so #eurovision
@PaulSando Conchita from Austria would say not optional.
@PaulSando is it a moustache-themed wedding? #eurovision
Lovely news that @ClaudiaWinkle has got the Strictly job - don't tell the others, but you're my favourite.
Just been told that I am 'choosing to be offended' by the word 'bint'. With a 'calm down' thrown in for good measure. @EverydaySexism
Big pod of dolphins in Lyall Bay now - happy Easter Wellington! #lyallbay #wellington #dolphins
I get proper goosebumps whenever Sally sings on #thevoiceuk
The intro to Parklife is not the best earworm to get as 4am insomnia hits #confidenceisapreference
New post, #glutenfree lemon & ricotta cake, guaranteed to make you feel ok about the state of your skirting boards http://t.co/HGM5xSEHr9
